name: Paparazzi
description: You copy one random card in your opponent's queue and play it.

immediateEffect.script: if (OpponentQueue.Count > 0) { int idx = Rng.Next(OpponentQueue.Count); var copied = OpponentQueue[idx].Clone(); PlayerQueue.Add(copied); Log(PlayerDisplayName + "'s paparazzi catches " + copied.Name + " and queues a copy!"); } else { Log("No cards to photograph in opponent's queue!"); }
